summary: REQ-46/47/48/49 appear implemented: a new Privacy Policy page was added, linked from the footer, registered in the TanStack Router, included in SEO route metadata, and added to the static sitemap. However, the diff summary also indicates multiple unrelated UI/SEO/feature expansions not requested in the BuildRequest (e.g., major career roadmap data expansion, navbar/logo restyling, global CSS changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/centralized career roadmap data and templates to support 200+ career paths across multiple categories, plus related selector/form/template changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-46–REQ-49; BuildRequest explicitly lists changing existing tool UIs/layouts/calculations as a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: StickyNavbar visual redesign/enhancements (new gradient container styling, borders/shadows, hover effects, icon fallback).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest non-goals include changing existing tool UIs/layouts (and REQ-47 asks to keep footer consistent; no navbar changes requested).

hallucinated_features.description: Global CSS/theme changes (OKLCH color system, new utilities, font changes/definitions, logo styling utilities).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for privacy-policy work; outside REQ-46–REQ-49 scope.
Not requested for privacy-policy work; outside REQ-46–REQ-49 scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/optimized HTML entry point metadata and added Google AdSense loader script in index.html.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-46–REQ-49 (privacy page should note third-party scripts, but adding/altering AdSense loader itself is not requested).

hallucinated_features.description: Refactored tool page layout to avoid duplicating navbar/footer by moving them to root layout.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested (REQ-46 only requires privacy-policy page to render within existing StickyNavbar + Footer layout).

hallucinated_features.description: Added caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking and additional contact/about content changes in the footer beyond the privacy-policy link.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-47 only requests making the Privacy Policy area clickable while keeping the short summary; other footer content changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Project-wide SEO config changes beyond adding /privacy-policy metadata (siteConfig updates, broader SEO optimizations).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-48 requests adding SEO metadata entry for /privacy-policy; other SEO configuration changes were not requested.
